item.title: C# - Enumerating a Registry Key Results in a Null Value
item.description: This post assumes .NET 4.0 After trying for some time to get a registry key to list all of its subkeys, I kept getting a null value back. This code does not work It always returns null. var keyName = @"SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Windows NT\CurrentVersion\ProfileGuid"; using (var guidSet = Registry.LocalMachine.OpenSubKey(keyName)) { if (guidSet != null) { foreach (var guid in guidSet.GetSubKeyNames()) { result.Add(guid); Console.WriteLine("{0}", guid); } } } This code works var keyName = @"SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Windows NT\CurrentVersion\ProfileGuid"; using (var hklm = RegistryKey.
